statements: SELECT * FROM crm_leads;
SELECT lead_name, email, phone_number FROM crm_leads WHERE lead_status = 'Open';
SELECT company_name, lead_name, email FROM crm_leads WHERE lead_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM crm_leads ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, phone_number, company_name FROM crm_leads WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM crm_leads WHERE lead_status='New' ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT lead_name, email FROM crm_leads WHERE company_name='ABC Corp' OR company_name='XYZ Corp';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, phone_number FROM crm_leads WHERE lead_status='Qualified' ORDER BY lead_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_leads WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT lead_name, company_name, email, phone_number FROM crm_leads WHERE lead_status='Converted';
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'Active';
SELECT lead_name, interaction_timestamp FROM leads JOIN interactions ON leads.lead_id = interactions.lead_id;
SELECT lead_name, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM leads JOIN interactions ON leads.lead_id = interactions.lead_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, interaction_timestamp FROM leads JOIN interactions ON leads.lead_id = interactions.lead_id ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_status='New';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_status='Active' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='Email' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM leads l JOIN interactions i ON l.lead_id=i.lead_id WHERE i.interaction_type='Call';

SELECT l.lead_name, l.lead_email, i.interaction_timestamp, i.interaction_type FROM leads l JOIN interactions i ON l.lead_id=i.lead_id WHERE l.lead_status='Inactive' ORDER BY i.interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_status='New';
SELECT * FROM contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, contact_email FROM leads JOIN contacts ON leads.lead_id = contacts.lead_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='Meeting';
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'New';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, interaction_date FROM contacts JOIN interactions ON contacts.contact_id = interactions.contact_id;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, interaction_type FROM leads JOIN interactions ON leads.lead_id = interactions.lead_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT lead_name, contact_name, interaction_date FROM leads JOIN contacts ON leads.lead_id = contacts.lead_id JOIN interactions ON contacts.contact_id = interactions.contact_id;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_phone_number FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'New';
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE lead_id IN (SELECT lead_id FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'Active');
SELECT contact_name, company_name FROM contacts INNER JOIN tasks ON contacts.contact_id = tasks.contact_id WHERE tasks.task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone_number FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'Converted'
SELECT contact_name, company_name, lead_name FROM contacts JOIN leads ON contacts.lead_id = leads.lead_id WHERE contact_id > 10 ORDER BY contact_name ASC
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT contact_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM contacts INNER JOIN tasks ON contacts.contact_id = tasks.contact_id WHERE tasks.task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_due_date DESC

SELECT lead_name, contact_name, interaction_type FROM leads JOIN contacts ON leads.lead_id = contacts.lead_id JOIN interactions ON leads.lead_id = interactions.lead_id WHERE contact_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM leads;
SELECT contact_name, company_name FROM contacts WHERE company_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT account_name, industry, account_phone, account_email FROM accounts WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT opportunity_name, amount, closing_date FROM opportunities ORDER BY closing_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM leads WHERE lead_status='new';
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE company_name IS NULL ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT account_name, industry, account_email FROM accounts WHERE industry='Technology' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM tasks WHERE status='pending' AND due_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT opportunity_name, amount, closing_date FROM opportunities WHERE stage='prospect' AND amount > 5000 ORDER BY closing_date DESC;
